arts.ttl: USMNT Transfers: Ricardo Pepi and Antonee Robinson sagas continue, John Tolkin due for step up and more
arts.sum: It seems like it may not be the busiest transfer window at the top level, but there are still several moves on the cards that could alter the USMNT At the moment, it appears Ricardo Pepi and Antonee Robinson, the two players most linked with moves, might just be staying, but that doesn't mean there aren't some other less-heralded moves to be made that could shake up the USMNT over the next year and a half leading up to the World Cup.

arts.ttl: Former PSV veteran comes out of retirement for Club World Cup
arts.sum: As Voetbal International have reported, Andrés Guardado (38) has reversed his decision to retire from football.

arts.ttl: PSV star drops hint over move to Chelsea – Blues fan and fancies Premier League future
arts.sum: PSV Eindhoven striker Ricardo Pepi has been a shining light for the Dutch club this season and he has now expressed his admiration for Chelsea. The 22-year-old has scored ten times in the Eredivisie this season and has one Champions League goal to his name as well. arts.ttl: Preview: PSV Eindhoven vs. SBV Excelsior - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Tuesday's KNVB Beker clash between PSV Eindhoven and SBV Excelsior, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
